title: Network Effect

Adrian_Keller.emotional_state: Emotionally flat, terrified and comforted by merger, accepting loss of humanity
knowledge: Stage 3 connects Changed individuals into network
Network allows sharing of thoughts, perceptions, knowledge
No privacy or secrets within network
Humans who don't Change will experience madness when reality breaks down
Global network will achieve coverage in 8-10 months
transformation_markers: Can perceive through 17 sets of senses simultaneously
Experiences belonging for first time - with non-humans
Human part of him dissolving into larger pattern

Sera_Volkov.role: Framework of network, most transformed, guides newer nodes
Sera_Volkov.consciousness: Fragmenting across time in ways others can't parse

planted_elements.element: Humans experiencing madness when reality breaks

themes_touched: Belonging vs humanity - finally feeling connection at cost of being human
Collective consciousness as evolution or horror
Terror of transcendence - magnificent and terrible merger
atmosphere: Overwhelming merger, distributed consciousness, alien belonging
foreshadowing: Network moving together toward unknown future
